ygData.subject: RE: Zatkin on Lullaby & Pixie Strike
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t think that he meant mobs higher level than you, I think he meant just plain higer level.  As in, level 30 mobs have a better chance to resist a
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Sometimes I wonder if Verant even reads the messages players send in. I
> think every player in EQ knows that mobs higher level than you have a
> better
> chance at resisting spell/song effects compared to mobs lower level than
> you. No where in Jason's letter did he mention his tests were against
> higher level mobs. At least he did say the testing department is checking
> it out.
>
> Galtin of E'ci (crossing his fingers that the testing department is not
> as
> bad as we think it is)
>
I don't think that he meant mobs higher level than you, I think he
meant just plain higer level. As in, level 30 mobs have a better chance to
resist a level 30 bard than a level 20 mob has of resisting a level 20 bard.
If this is the way it's meant to be, lullaby would definately come out of my
playlist very soon. It barely works at 28.

Bien
